channel.title: Autism Spectrum Disorder on Behaviorism and Mental Health
channel.description: Recent content in Autism Spectrum Disorder on Behaviorism and Mental Health

item.title: Autism Prevalence Increasing
item.description: On two occasions in the past week or so, I have been involved in discussions on the increasing prevalence of autism.Â  In the more recent of these, the individual with whom I was talking expressed the concern that the recent DSM enlargement of autism disorder to autism spectrum disorder might be an APA-pharma designed artifact to draw attention away from the steady increase in the incidence of autism in recent decades.
